short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize research from websites & PDFs. Categorize highlights, images, links, notes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Feeling overwhelmed by research scattered across countless notes and highlights? Take back control with Snipd, your one-stop research companion. Snipd empowers you to effortlessly capture essential text, images, and links from websites and PDFs. Organize your findings into clear, topic-based collections for easy access and laser focus.

But Snipd doesn't stop there. Unleash the power of Gemini AI directly within the extension. Summarize entire note collections and gain deeper insights from your research.  Export your meticulously organized knowledge into various formats, including clean, study-ready PDFs, for ultimate review efficiency. Snipd â€“ research mastery, powered by AI.

Snipd empowers you to:

-> Effortlessly capture: Essential text, images, and links from websites and PDFs.
-> Organize with ease: Create clear, topic-based collections for streamlined access and focus.
-> Unleash Gemini AI: Summarize entire note collections and gain deeper insights from your research directly within the extension.
-> Export for mastery: Turn your meticulously organized knowledge into various formats, including clean, study-ready PDFs, for ultimate review efficiency.
